text: Bertil Persson (30 April 1914 - 19 November 1978) was a Swedish alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Swedish male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Sweden Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Åre Municipality
title: Bertil Persson (alpine skier)
